discussion.author: affeldt-aist
discussion.comment:
+1

We have been using a variant of this lemma (with a useless generalization) in infotheo so that would help.

It can also be proved as follows:
```
Lemma tval_tcastE T m n (eq_mn : m = n) (t : m.-tuple T) :
  tcast eq_mn t = t :> seq T.
Proof. by subst n; rewrite tcast_id. Qed.
```
Not very ssreflectish...

review_discussion.author: CohenCyril
review_discussion.comment:

```suggestion
Lemma val_tcast m n (eq_mn : m = n) (t : m.-tuple T) :
```
